articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Kyoksul Training of KPA Service Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Kyoksul Training of KPA Service Personnel
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, together with the participants in the meeting of frontline soldiers of the KPA, watched a kyoksul (Korean martial art) training conducted by service personnel of KPA Unit 3168 and KPA Unit 695.
					 The training ground was pervaded with sky-high militant spirit.
					
					 The spectators cheered and applauded the soldiers whenever they beat down "enemies" at a lightening speed with deadly blows. 
					
					 Through their training the service personnel fully demonstrated the might of the heroic KPA which has grown stronger to be a matchless army under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, a great brilliant commander of Songun, who has firmly protected the dignity of the country and sovereignty of the nation by foiling all moves of the imperialists and reactionaries with his matchless pluck, iron will and outstanding strategy.
					
					 After watching their training, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the soldiers are fully prepared to defend the socialist country as firm as an iron wall and highly appreciated their success in the training.
					
					 The Juche-oriented revolutionary cause is invincible as there is the KPA strong in idea and faith, the army which regards it as its unshakable faith to protect the leader unto death in the spirit of becoming human bullets and bombs and in the self-blasting spirit, he said.
					
					 He gave important instructions which would serve as guidelines for bolstering up the combat capability of the KPA in every way.
					
					 Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Kyong Ok and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of KPA Frontline Soldiers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Meeting of KPA Frontline Soldiers
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and  first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the meeting of KPA frontline soldiers.
					 Waving back to their enthusiastic cheers, he extended a warm salute to them.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats of the participants in the meeting who are unhesitatingly dedicating their youth and lives to the sacred military service despite rain or snow with revolutionary faith, gem- like conscience and true sense of moral obligation.
					
					 He said all frontline soldiers including the participants are precious revolutionary comrades and comrades-in-arms of the WPK and expressed expectation and belief that they would successfully perform their honorable mission and duty in carrying out the Songun revolution, always bearing in mind the trust of the party in them. Then he had a photo taken with them. 
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Kyong Ok and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Dwelling Houses in Ryongsong-Sopho Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Dwelling Houses in Ryongsong-Sopho Area 
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a field survey of the construction of dwelling houses in the Ryongsong-Sopho area. 
					 Going round several construction sites of apartment houses he learned in detail about the construction plan and supply of building materials before having a consultative meeting. 
					
					 The meeting discussed issues for fully applying in the construction the important guidelines set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his historic letter to the participants in the great workshop of officials in the construction field. 
					
					 Concrete measures were taken so that relevant fields including construction units can push forward the construction and ensure the supply of necessary equipment and building materials on the principle of putting the conveniences of the people above all. 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju also went round the construction site of terminal 2 of Pyongyang Airport to take measures for its earlier completion.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Anniversary
						
 Hamhung, December 28 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting of foreign crewmen took place in Hungnam Port, South Hamgyong Province, on Saturday to mark the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The participants in the meeting laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City and paid tribute. 
					
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leone-flagged ship "Chun Yang 8". 
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA was honor and happiness of the progressives including the Korean people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un loves the arms from his early years and he was always together with Kim Jong Il on the road of Songun revolution, wisely leading the armed forces of the DPRK and performing immortal exploits in the Juche-oriented cause of army-building, they said, adding: 
					
					 World people admire talented military wisdom, unique commanding art and matchless guts of Kim Jong Un. The Korean People's Army led by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, peerless and brilliant commander of Songun, is the invincible revolutionary army. 
					
					 They expressed conviction that the heroic KPA and people of the DPRK would achieve a final victory in building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification united in single mind around Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: 72000 Rare Trees and Flower Shrubs Take Roots in Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
72000 Rare Trees and Flower Shrubs Take Roots in Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people and youth and students planted more than 72 000 rare trees and flower shrubs of over 110 species in the arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun this year with much enthusiasm for sprucing up the area of the palace.
					 Officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces planted with care over 4 700 trees of more than 40 species out of single mind to devotedly safeguard the palace where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 Rare trees and flower shrubs planted in the arboretum by officials of many units including the Ministry of Railways, Ministry of Labor, the General Bureau of Public Service and the State Academy of Sciences reflect their strong yearnings and reverence for the great Generalissimos.
					
					 In February and April in which the Day of the Shining Star and the Day of the Sun fall, more than 44 000 trees and flower shrubs of over 60 species took their roots in the arboretum thanks to the ardent desire of the army and people of the DPRK to turn the  Arboretum into the most beautiful place.
					
					 With the reverence for the great Generalissimos further growing, youth, students and other people planted more than 3 200 rare trees and flower shrubs of over 20 species in July and December, months marking the anniversaries of their demise.
					
					 The will of the army and people to glorify the revolutionary careers and exploits of the Generalissimos was displayed on several other occasions including the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of a victory in the war.
					
					 Lots of families across the country contributed to sprucing up the area of the palace with rare trees and flower shrubs they tended with sincerity.
					
					 The arboretum is taking on a beautiful look thanks to the sincere dedication of the service persons and people to the grand seat of the revolution, the holy land of the sun.

articles.title: History of Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Associated with Comradeship
articles.content:
History of Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Associated with Comradeship
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The history of Songun (military-first) leadership by Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), is associated with his noble outlook on comrades-in-arms.
					 Calling all the servicepersons his comrades-in-arms, he does not hesitate to risk his life to meet them, and such warm love resulted in a harmonious whole between the Supreme Commander and the soldiers.
					
					 On January 1, Juche 101 (2012), Kim Jong Un inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA. During his visit he had a photo session with its servicepersons, arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder, which deeply touched all the people.
					
					 What he regards as the most powerful and precious is not the military equipment but the servicepersons.
					
					 So, when visiting the defence detachment on Jangjae Islet and Hero Defence Detachment on Mu Islet, he was greatly pleased to hear that the soldiers of the detachments are delighted at their new barracks with good living conditions, built better than their homes.
					
					 And inspecting the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, he earnestly asked its commander and political instructor to take good care of the soldiers like their real brothers and turn the detachment into a home dear to them.
					
					 He has disregarded weather conditions to go to any place where soldiers are deployed in the country, showing deep care for their training and living and urging the commanding officers to always care for their soldiers' living conditions.
					
					 His loving care turned the whole army into a community in which all the servicepersons share the same destiny with their Supreme Commander.
					
					 With the approach of the second anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership, the DPRK people are convinced that the KPA will further display its might as the strong revolutionary Paektusan army under his guidance.

articles.title: Dangerous U.S. Scenario for New World War under Fire
articles.content:
Dangerous U.S. Scenario for New World War under Fire 
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has worked hard for decades to build global missile defense system describing it as "defensive", but it, in actuality, is aimed at preemptive attacks on other countries, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. plan for a prompt global strike is too ambitious if it is aimed at an individual country only. 
					
					 Washington says the plan envisages attack with the use of conventional weapons. But, only attackers will know what kind of warhead will be loaded on the launched cruise missile. There is no guarantee that nuclear warhead will not be mounted. 
					
					 During the early period of his office U.S. President Obama spoke loudly of his plan to build a "world without nuclear weapons". The U.S. has branded those countries going against the grain with it as "nuclear criminals" and put spurs to developing latest weapons under the pretext of destroying their "nuclear facilities". The U.S. plan for prompt global strike is designed for putting it into practice with an ultimate aim at a preemptive attack. 
					
					 Clear is what Washington has in mind when spending a huge amount of fund for development and modernization of latest war hardware though it reels from serious economic crisis. Its attempt is to seek a way out of the economic crisis in a new war of aggression. The danger of a thermonuclear war is increasing in the world due to the U.S. arms buildup under the signboard of building a "world without nuclear weapons". 
					
					 The U.S. plan for a prompt global strike shows that it is going to ignite a war against any country of the world with the nuclear and conventional weapons. 
					
					 The U.S. moves for a new war are criminal acts going against the trend of the times advancing toward disarmament and peace. They are also sparking off international arms race. 
					
					 It is anachronistic that the U.S. is resorting to reckless military acts as it is a chief culprit disturbing world peace and stability and escalating arms race. 
					
					 It is a great mistake for the U.S. warlike forces to calculate that they would be safe while dreaming of a new world war.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Illegal Repression of Trade Unions
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Illegal Repression of Trade Unions
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions and Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Thursday denouncing the illegal suppression by the puppet regime.
					 Speakers at the conference said the police stormed the headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions and arrested many unionists on December 22.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 It was very just act that they blocked the police illegally entering their offices without a search warrant.
					
					 The police, however, plans to indict and investigate all of them.
					
					 The authorities leave unpunished those who illegally interfered in the election and crack down on the workers engaged in acts for legitimate self-defence. Such fact is indicative of the future of the present regime.
					
					 They demanded the regime punish those chiefly responsible for the recent suppression and cancel the police plan to make indictment.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime's Crackdown on Trade Union under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime's Crackdown on Trade Union under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of various circles strongly protested the police's brutal acts of storming and playing havoc with the offices of the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					 Teachers' organizations including the Trade Union of Professors held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday denouncing the present regime for answering the demand of workers with suppression.
					
					 They stressed that the Park Geun Hye's regime has to step down as it persists in the oppressive rule.
					
					 The Council of Christian Churches released a commentary on the same day, pointing at the police's repressive racket and urging the ruling forces to recollect why all the plans of the regime cause social conflicts.
					
					 The commentary said that the authorities should not create social crisis over the issue of privatization any longer but give up the plan.
					
					 Earlier to this, the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held an emergency meeting on Monday at which it held the police's repressive acts clearly showed the present regime's approach to the labor movement.
					
					 The organization declared that it would not hold any dialogue with the regime until it makes an apology and punishes those responsible.

articles.title: CBS Slams "Saenuri" Party
articles.content:
CBS Slams "Saenuri" Party 
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- CBS, broadcasting service of south Korea, slammed the ruling "Saenuri" Party on Wednesday. 
					 It said that the party, kowtowing to power and shunning the unjust suppression of trade unions, branded the strike of the Railway Trade Union as "non-compliance with the results of the presidential election". 
					
					 This is the misrepresentation of the struggle of the Railway Trade Union by the "government" and the ruling party, it said, adding:
					
					 Mutual understanding with the people is an urgent matter for Chongwadae and the ruling party in view of the great unity of the people, which was put forward by Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Election Rigging of Puppet Group
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Election Rigging of Puppet Group
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Churches for Reform in south Korea released a declaration on the situation on December 23 condemning the election rigging by the puppet group.
					 The declaration said Park Geun Hye should no longer try to hide the truth about the fraudulent election and justify it as the election was clearly revealed to have been rigged.
					
					 The regime will certainly face all-people resistance if it continues to suppress the people who raise just demand, the declaration stressed.

articles.title: Suppression of Trade Unions in S. Korea Denounced
articles.content:
Suppression of Trade Unions in S. Korea Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Society for Measures against Human Rights Abuses in south Korea Saturday made public a statement in denunciation of the fascist suppression of the people including railway workers by the south Korean puppet regime. 
					 The statement said the struggle of south Korean workers including the railway trade unionists is the righteous struggle to protect vital rights, elementary human rights. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Reneging on the commitment not to privatize the railway service, the puppet group termed the just struggle of workers against privatization an "illegal act" and threatened to "cope with it by law and on principle", not content with pursuing pro-plutocrats policy. Even the chief executive of south Korea spitefully talked about "tough countermeasure". 
					
					 The regime harshly suppressed the strike of the workers for vital rights and hurled thousands of armed policemen to putting down the strike just like waging a military operation. The fascist suppression revealed the despicable nature and true colors of the group of Park Geun Hye as the descendant of "yusin" dictator and vicious human rights abuser. 
					
					 Those resorting to the fascist and iron rule going against people's mindset are bound to face destruction. 
					
					 The puppet regime should stop at once the fascist suppression and ensure vital rights for the people if it does not want to follow in the footsteps of the predecessors who met miserable ends for running amuck in fascist oppression. 
					
					 The Society for Measures against Human Rights Abuses in south Korea calls upon foreign human rights organizations and international bodies valuing justice and conscience to raise the voice of denouncing the suppression by the fascist clique, and express positive support and solidarity with the just struggle of the south Korean people for vital rights and democracy of society.

articles.title: "Government" Authorities' Investigation into Railway Workers' Strike Denounced
articles.content:
"Government" Authorities' Investigation into Railway Workers' Strike Denounced 
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Railway Trade Union released a commentary on December 24 to strongly denounce the puppet government authorities' investigation into the strike of the union for vital rights, according to the CBS, broadcasting service of south Korea. 
					 A few days ago, media went public that the Railway Service Corporation collected materials related to the struggle of the Railway Trade Union against the privatization and regularly informed the puppet Intelligence Service and Chongwadae about it. 
					
					 This disclosed that the authorities are trying to disrupt the strike of the trade union, the organization said.
					
					 This is a really shocking incident disregarding the rights of labor, it added. 
					
					 The organization urged the "government" to immediately stop the suppression of the labor movement.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Marks 96th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Marks 96th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of Songun Policy released information bulletin on Dec. 22 to mark the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin in an article "Kim Jong Suk's feats in army building in DPRK" said:
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Jong Suk are recorded in the history of the Korean People's Army (KPA) demonstrating its might as an invincible army in the world.
					
					 She paid deep attention to training military and political cadres to be the backbone of the regular forces, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 She frequently visited Pyongyang Institute and Central Security Officers School and led them to conduct all trainings in an effective way.
					
					 She worked heart and soul to build units of all branches of arms.
					
					 She also made devoted efforts to develop the country's munitions industry that started from scratch.
					
					 The feats she performed in the army building will shine forever along with the invincible might of the KPA.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to commemorate the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, second anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included opening ceremonies of Korean book, photo and handcraft exhibitions in Mexico and Peru, a seminar in Italy and film shows in DR Congo and Nigeria from Dec. 7 to 18.
					
					 Displayed in the exhibitions were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on show there were photos dealing with the sacred revolutionary careers and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handcrafts associated with wisdom and talent of the Korean people.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "Arms of Korea" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Present there were personages of various circles and masses in those countries.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said the DPRK is shedding its rays as the great Paektusan nation and Juche-based socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another great brilliant commander of Songun.
					
					 Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, said the exhibition offered an opportunity for the party to know better about the undying exploits of Kim Jong Il and the greatness of Kim Jong Un, who is leading the DPRK to victory, true to the intention of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Marco Rizzo, general secretary of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, in a speech said the cause of socialism has been firmly protected in the DPRK, adding this would have been unthinkable without the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo lauded Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly great man, for developing the revolutionary forces of the DPRK into the invincible army of the party and leader and turning the DPRK into an impregnable fortress.

articles.title: Foreign Media Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
articles.content:
Foreign Media Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
						
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups to mark the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The December issue of International Link, magazine of Hong Kong, China, carried several articles illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In the article "Supreme commander of the KPA" the magazine said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership was a special event that provided a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Songun through generations.
					
					 It also helped fully preserve the feats President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in building Juche-based army and further develop the KPA into the army of the leader and party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's is guerrilla-style leadership based on the spirit of Mt. Paektu and attack, ever-victorious one turning misfortune into blessings and immortal one for faithful inheritance and bold renovation.
					
					 Dec. 19 issue of the Russian paper C. M. No. 1 devoted one whole page to several articles illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un standing in the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website on Dec. 17  an article titled "Guards division and Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un" and "The leader and children of the DPRK" introducing the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de Kyoksul de militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de Kyoksul de militares
						
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los participantes en la conferencia de centinelas del EPC el entrenamiento de Kyoksul (arte marcial) de los militares de las unidades 3168 y 695 del EPC.
					Cada vez que los militares derribaban a los "enemigos" lanzandose como relampago y mostraban la temerosa fuerza de golpe, los espectadores les dirigieron la efusiva ovacion con  las aclamaciones.
					
					A traves del entrenamiento, los militares pusieron de pleno manifiesto el majestuoso aspecto del heroico EPC que se consolida como poderosa fuerza armada sin rival bajo la atencion del Mariscal, gran General distinguido del Songun, quien defiende con firmeza la dignidad del pais y la soberania de la nacion frustrando todas las tentativas de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios con la audacia sin igual, la ferrea voluntad y la extraordinaria destreza.
					
					Tras ver el entrenamiento, el Mariscal evaluo altamente el exito del entrenamiento senalando que los militares se han preparado bien para la defensa de la patria socialista.
					
					Prosiguio que es invencible la causa de la revolucion del Juche gracias a contar con el EPC, fuerza armada fuerte en la idea y conviccion que considera como su fe invariable el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider, el de balas y bombas humanas y el de suicidio.
					
					El Mariscal dio la valiosa instruccion de que servira de guia en fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad del EPC.
					
					Le acompanaron en verlo Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Kyong Ok y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de centinelas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de  centinelas 
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los participantes en la conferencia de los centinelas del EPC.
					Agitando la mano, el Mariscal envio el cordial saludo a las fervientes aclamaciones de los participantes.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas de los participantes quienes guardando la conviccion revolucionaria, la conciencia y la verdadera obligacion moral dedican su juventud y vida en el sagrado servicio militar sin hacer caso de las ventiscas y lluvias.
					
					Diciendo que los participantes y todos los centinelas son los valiosos camaradas revolucionarios de armas de nuestro partido, expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran satisfactoriamente su honrosa mision y deber en el camino de la revolucion del Songun sin olvidar siempre la confianza del partido y se fotografio a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Won Hong, Kim Kyong Ok y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita campo de construccion de viviendas en Ryongsong-Sopho
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita campo de construccion de viviendas en Ryongsong-Sopho
						
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno como se construyen las viviendas en la zona de Ryongsong-Sopho.
					Recorriendo varios apartamentos en construccion, se informo del plan de ejecucion y del estado de abastecimiento de materiales de construccion.
					
					En la reunion de consulta convocada en el terreno, se debatieron las medidas para cumplir cabalmente en la construccion de viviendas las instrucciones del Mariscal Kim Jong Un dadas en su historico mensaje remitido a los participantes en el gran cursillo de la rama de construccion.
					
					Se asignaron tareas a las unidades vinculadas como las de ejecucion de la obra para que ellas aceleren la edificacion de viviendas en el principio de dar prioridad al confort de los habitantes y suministren en lo suficiente los equipos y materiales necesarios.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier estuvo en el campo de construccion del 2o edificio del Aeropuerto de Pyongyang donde tomo las medidas para concluir rapido esa obra.

articles.title: Portavoz de Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH denuncia represion fascista contra obreros surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH denuncia represion fascista contra obreros surcoreanos
						
　Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publico el dia 28 una declaracion denunciando la represion fascista de la banda titere surcoreana contra los obreros ferroviarios y otros trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					　La lucha de obreros surcoreanos, incluyendo los miembros del Sindicato de Ferrocarril, es la muy justa por defender el mas elemental derecho a la existencia, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					　La banda surcoreana practica la politica pro-plutocrata incumpliendo la promesa de no privatizar el ferrocarril y define ahora la justa lucha de obreros contra la privatizacion como "acto ilegal" amenazando con "enfrentarla segun la ley y el principio".
					
					　Hasta la mandataria actual esta hablando de la "reaccion intransigente".
					
					　Las atrocidades de la banda de Park Geun-hye, que reprime la huelga de los obreros por el derecho a la existencia y moviliza a miles de policias armados en la arremetida contra las sedes de entidades sindicales, demuestran la naturaleza de esa descendiente del dictador de "Yusin" como sofocadora de DDHH.
					
					　Seran arruinados los que practican la dominacion de hierro y sangre rehusando la opinion publica.
					
					　Si la horda titere surcoreana no quiere repetir el tragico fin de los predecesores que se habian dedicado a la represion fascista, debe poner fin ahora mismo a sus actos de represion y garantizar a los habitantes el derecho a la vida.
					
					　La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea exhorta a las entidades de DDHH de varios paises y las organizaciones internacionales, que aprecian la justicia y la conciencia, a elevar las voces de denuncia a la brutal represion de la banda surcoreana y expresar el apoyo total y la solidaridad a la justa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por el derecho a la vida y la democratizacion.
